item.title: 套期保值成本上升，交易员为国债收益率下降做好准备
item.description: 尽管周二 30 年期国债收益率达到了六个月来的最低水平，但债券交易员仍在为国债收益率进一步下降做准备。【原文：Bond traders are preparing for Treasury yields to drop further even as the 30-year reached its lowest level in six months on Tuesday.】

item.title: Capital One 盈利超预期，宣布 160 亿美元回购
item.description: Capital One Financial Corp. 公布的第三季度利润大幅增长，超过了华尔街的预期，该贷款公司宣布计划在收购 Discover Financial Services 之后回购多达 160 亿美元的股票。【原文：Capital One Financial Corp. reported a surge in third-quarter profit, beating Wall Street estimates, and the lender announced plans to repurchase as much as $16 billion of stock in the wake of its acquisition of Discover Financial Services.】

item.title: GE Vernova 同意支付 53 亿美元收购 Prolec 50%的股份
item.description: 随着人工智能热潮对电力行业产品和服务需求的推动，通用电气弗诺瓦公司（GE Vernova Inc.【原文：GE Vernova Inc. has agreed to buy the stake in transformer maker Prolec GE that it doesn’t already own as the artificial intelligence boom drives demand for products and services in the power sector.】

item.title: 穆迪称美国银行支持 3000 亿美元私人信贷债务
item.description: 对承销质量的担忧使私人信贷在华尔街炙手可热。然而，一些发出警告的银行却在推动该资产类别的增长。【原文：Anxiety about the quality of underwriting has put private credit in the hot seat on Wall Street. Yet some of the same banks raising the alarm are the ones fueling growth in the asset class.】

item.title: 德州仪器发出芯片复苏放缓信号
item.description: 最大的模拟芯片制造商德州仪器公司（Texas Instruments Inc.【原文：Texas Instruments Inc., the biggest maker of analog chips, gave a lackluster forecast for the current period, adding to concern that a semiconductor industry recovery is sputtering.】

item.description: 在全球油田压裂需求放缓的情况下，哈里伯顿公司（Halliburton Co.【原文：Halliburton Co. is diversifying into data-center power generation amid slackening worldwide demand for oilfield fracking.】

item.title: Netflix 称巴西税收战挤压了本应稳健的一季度业绩
item.description: Netflix Inc. 表示，与巴西的税务纠纷削减了第三季度的盈利，使原本符合华尔街预期的业绩大打折扣。【原文：Netflix Inc. said a tax dispute with Brazil cut into third-quarter earnings, marring results that otherwise fell in line with Wall Street estimates.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯引诱麦格理和莱因哈特向澳大利亚求爱
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯正加紧努力深化与澳大利亚的关系，因为沙特正寻求利用金属、采矿和金融交易带来的新势头。【原文：Saudi Arabia is ramping up efforts to deepen ties with Australia — a country with which it has traditionally done limited business — as the kingdom seeks to capitalize on fresh momentum from deals in metals, mining and finance.】

item.title: 监督机构警告：国会正在摧毁秘鲁的经济支柱
item.description: 秘鲁财政监督机构发出了迄今为止最严厉的警告，称秘鲁稳固的经济支柱正面临着新立法举措带来的严重风险，这些举措的成本难以控制。【原文：Peru’s fiscal watchdog is issuing its most stern warning yet that the country’s solid economic pillars are at serious risk from new legislative initiatives that carry an unmanageable cost.】

item.title: 预测市场蓬勃发展，预测量超过 2024 年大选
item.description: 领先的预测市场平台 Polymarket 和 Kalshi 的交易量创下历史新高，超过了去年美国总统大选期间达到的峰值。【原文：The trading volume on the leading prediction markets platforms, Polymarket and Kalshi, has hit a new record high, surpassing the previous peak reached during the US presidential election last year.】

item.title: 制造业首席执行官希望加拿大效仿特朗普 "美丽大法案 "中的减税措施
item.description: 制造业高管表示，加拿大政府应从唐纳德-特朗普的减税政策中汲取灵感，帮助企业在面临美国关税带来的成本压力和不确定性时保持竞争力。【原文：Manufacturing executives say the Canadian government should take inspiration from Donald Trump’s tax cuts to help businesses remain competitive as they face cost pressures and uncertainty from US tariffs.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行为 15 亿美元的 Verint 收购贷款提供优惠定价
item.description: 以桑坦德银行（Banco Santander）为首的银行集团对与 Thoma Bravo 私有化 Verint Systems Inc.【原文：A group of banks led by Banco Santander has sweetened terms on a loan tied to Thoma Bravo’s take-private of Verint Systems Inc., a rare example of a faltering buyout financing in the midst of a corporate-lending boom.】

item.title: GeoPark 的 Bayon 公司在阿根廷页岩区达成交易后寻求增长
item.description: 拉丁美洲石油和天然气生产商 GeoPark Ltd. 首席执行官 Felipe Bayón 表示，在达成进入阿根廷珍贵的 Vaca Muerta 盆地的协议后，该公司计划继续扩张。【原文：Latin American oil and gas producer GeoPark Ltd. plans to keep expanding after striking a deal to enter Argentina’s prized Vaca Muerta basin, according to Chief Executive Officer Felipe Bayón.】

item.title: 苹果与 Epic 就开放应用商店之争重返法庭
item.description: 苹果公司周二再次向美国联邦上诉法院提起上诉，对迫使其开放利润丰厚的移动应用商店链接廉价支付方式的命令提出异议。【原文：Apple Inc. is back before a US federal appeals court Tuesday contesting an order forcing it to open its lucrative mobile App Store to links to cheaper payment options.】

item.title: Pimco 从 Meta 数据中心获得 20 亿美元纸张收益
item.description: 太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.【原文：Pacific Investment Management Co. is already cashing in on the $27 billion debt package it led for a Meta Platforms Inc. data center.】

item.title: 主权财富基金推动 3.5 万亿美元年度最大交易
item.description: 财大气粗的主权财富基金正在帮助推动交易的复苏，今年全球并购交易额已超过 3.5 万亿美元。【原文：Deep-pocketed sovereign wealth funds are helping drive a resurgence in dealmaking that’s taken global M&A volumes past $3.5 trillion this year.】

item.title: 美国财政部出售美元使比索保持在阿根廷外汇区间内
item.description: 据直接知情人士透露，随着比索接近交易区间的上限，美国财政部周二再次通过桑坦德银行在阿根廷货币市场抛售美元。【原文：The US Treasury sold dollars again on Tuesday through Banco Santander in Argentina’s currency market as the peso neared the ceiling of its trading band, according to people with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 为什么黄金在不确定时期具有如此大的吸引力？
item.description: 几个世纪以来，黄金一直是政治和经济不稳定时期的避风港资产。黄金作为一种可靠的高价值商品，可以方便地运输并在任何地方出售，当其他一切都处于动荡之中时，黄金给人一种安全感。【原文：For centuries, gold has been the go-to haven asset in times of political and economic uncertainty. Its status as a reliably high-value commodity that can be transported easily and sold anywhere offers a sense of safety when everything else is in turmoil.】

item.title: 苹果计划推出配备 18 英寸屏幕的可折叠 iPad，但开发工作受阻
item.description: 苹果公司通过增加一个巨大的可折叠屏幕来重塑 iPad 的努力遇到了开发障碍，可能会推迟计划中的上市时间。【原文：Apple Inc.’s effort to reinvent the iPad by adding a giant foldable screen has hit development hurdles, potentially delaying the planned launch.】

item.title: First Brands 创始人遭保安起诉，要求支付加班费
item.description: First Brands 创始人帕特里克-詹姆斯（Patrick James）被两名私人保安起诉，他们声称在为这家破产汽车供应商最近离职的首席执行官提供人身保护时，被错误地拒绝支付加班费。【原文：First Brands founder Patrick James has been sued by two private security guards who claim they were wrongly denied overtime pay while providing personal protection to the bankrupt auto supplier’s recently departed chief executive officer.】

item.title: 微软免除许多销售人员返回办公室的义务
item.description: 微软公司（Microsoft Corp. ）将免除许多销售职位的重返办公室任务，提供了比许多科技行业同行更灵活的方法。【原文：Microsoft Corp. will exempt many sales roles from its coming return-to-office mandate, offering a more flexible approach than many of its tech industry peers.】

item.title: 中国称荷兰 Nexperia 公司遭扣押供应链面临风险
item.description: 中国商务部长警告说，荷兰政府控制中资芯片制造商耐克斯派瑞亚公司的举动 "严重影响 "了全球供应链的稳定。【原文：China’s Commerce Minister warned that the Dutch state’s move to take control of Chinese-owned chipmaker Nexperia has “seriously affected” the stability of the global supply chain.】

item.title: 斯托纳拉斯：欧洲央行实现了经济软着陆和复苏
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员亚尼斯-斯托纳拉斯（Yannis Stournaras）表示，欧洲中央银行在保持经济韧性的同时，将通胀率恢复到了 2%，实现了 "软着陆"。【原文：The European Central Bank pulled off a “soft landing” by returning inflation to 2% while maintaining economic resilience, Governing Council member Yannis Stournaras said.】

item.title: CDS 小组呼吁外部帮助决定阿达赫赔付事宜
item.description: 一个负责监督信用违约掉期市场的小组正在寻求外部帮助，以决定阿达赫公司与其债权人最近达成的债务协议是否应触发保险赔付。【原文：A panel overseeing the credit default swaps market is asking for external help to decide whether a recent debt deal between Ardagh and its creditors should trigger a payout of the insurance.】

item.title: OpenAI 将通过新的 ChatGPT Atlas 浏览器挑战谷歌
item.description: OpenAI即将推出其首款人工智能驱动的网络浏览器，这将使这家ChatGPT制造商与Alphabet公司旗下的谷歌在新的领域展开竞争。【原文：OpenAI is set to unveil its first artificial intelligence-powered web browser, putting the ChatGPT maker in competition on a new front with Alphabet Inc.’s Google.】

item.title: 加密货币风险胃口下降，阿尔特币跌破 FTX 后低点
item.description: 在近 200 亿美元的抛售引发该行业历史上最大的单日洗盘后不到两周，加密货币市场陷入了清算后的困境。【原文：The crypto market is stuck in post-liquidation limbo less than two weeks after a nearly $20 billion selloff triggered the largest single-day washout in the industry’s history.】

item.title: 美国将购买 100 万桶战略石油储备
item.description: 特朗普政府计划为美国战略石油储备购买 100 万桶石油，利用低油价开始填补枯竭的储备。【原文：The Trump administration plans to buy 1 million barrels for the US Strategic Petroleum Reserve, taking advantage of low oil prices to begin filling the depleted stockpile.】

item.title: 巴里克被查封的马里金矿在国家管理下重新启动
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，巴里克矿业公司（Barrick Mining Corp.）在马里的大型金矿在 6 月份由国家管理者接管后，九个多月来首次重新开始运营。【原文：Operations restarted at Barrick Mining Corp.’s massive gold mine in Mali for the first time in more than nine months, after a state administrator took over the asset in June, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 谷歌 "月神工厂 "将对里约数据中心电网进行审查
item.description: 据里约热内卢市副市长称，Alphabet 公司的谷歌探月工厂计划在里约热内卢建设潜在的数据中心之前对该市的电网进行审查，这些数据中心将使里约热内卢成为拉丁美洲人工智能产业的前沿。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google moonshot factory plans to review Rio de Janeiro’s power grid ahead of the potential construction of data centers that would put the city at the forefront of Latin America’s artificial-intelligence industry, according to the city’s vice mayor.】

item.title: 英国央行行长贝利警告私人信贷将回响金融危机
item.description: 英格兰银行警告说，1.7 万亿美元的私人信贷繁荣与次贷危机有相似之处，因为英国官员确认了让市场接受压力测试的计划。【原文：The Bank of England warned of parallels between the $1.7 trillion private credit boom and the subprime debt crisis, as UK officials confirmed plans to subject the market to stress tests.】
